title: Shows wrong ip and won't let me spent it
body:
1) New Client
2) I had 4880 IP, and I went to buy Caitlyn, but it wouldn't let me buy her.

I went on my friends computer with the old client and was able to purchase her. I went back on my client, and it shows that i have 4900 IP.

replies.body:
same as: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion/UElOfsmi-store-not-recognizing-ip-balance

We'll look into it.
